intro: Ludwigia peruviana var. glaberrima, commonly known as the smooth Ludwigia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Onagraceae family and is characterized by its bright red or orange flowers. The plant typically grows in wetland environments, such as marshes and along stream banks. Its leaves are usually opposite and lance-shaped, with a smooth surface. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant in aquatic gardens due to its vibrant color and ease of care.
